posts.post_content: Interesting. It kind of kills all the normal person plans for Goblin decks... On the other hand, my token-loving self is extremely tempted to love it, but it works better if it's not in a specifically Goblin deck, but rather just one card in a token deck. That way you're not compromising your whole strategy, just introducing a stinging new facet to your gameplay.

posts.post_content: Not meant to goblin decks. Great for a deck that is low on creatures, you can just "set this and forget". Even better for a Devour devour deck, and at three CMC, you can play this pretty early on to have a good pact for a devour. Except no one plays devour in Standard Tournaments. Only in amateur.
